programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways… or else!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission…and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Cinderella Game
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best vocalists in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Youth of May
programme.desc: The human melodrama, set in Gwangju in the spring of 1980, is about the story of youths seeking to follow their destiny unaware of the historic but chaotic times that are about to fall upon them.

programme.title: Youth of May
programme.desc: The human melodrama, set in Gwangju in the spring of 1980, is about the story of youths seeking to follow their destiny unaware of the historic but chaotic times that are about to fall upon them.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Heart on Wheels
programme.desc: An observational variety show where a mobile convenience store packed with daily necessities is delivered to a rural village, and the night is spent there.

programme.title: Boss in the Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examinations to create better working environment for their employees.

programme.title: ASEAN⋅Korea Music Festival 2025 ROUND in Malaysia
programme.desc: A public cultural diplomacy project designed to broaden the Korea-ASEAN cooperation relationship and provide a venue for cultural exchange among Asian youth through popular music. Indonesia, Busan, and Laos will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia this year. KBS presents various live musicians of K-music to ASEAN beyond the limits of K-pop, and plays a central role in connecting 10 ASEAN countries and Korea with culture.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: The Trigonal: Fight for Justice
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate runs a drug-induced underground fighting tournament, where fighters become guinea pigs for experimental drugs. A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in the tournament. The syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women’s Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei’s father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: The guys visit Cedric's hometown of St. Louis and some of Cedric's old stomping grounds, then the famous Kenrick's Butchers, where they learn all about St. Louis signature-style pork steak and tips.

programme.title: The Paramedic Who Stalked Me
programme.desc: After an accident, a young woman finds herself the target of the EMT who saved her life. She reminds him of his high school love who died - and he will do anything to have her back in his life.

programme.title: My Father's Murder In Greece
programme.desc: When Allie's father George takes her on a trip to Greece to discover her familial roots, George soon ends up murdered. Now Allie must uncover long-kept family secrets to bring the killer to justice.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to make a beautiful, quick-cooking white ragu sauce that she'll serve over ribbony pappardelle pasta, cooked al dente style.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Semi-dried tomatoes are a new staple in American grocery stores. Rachael demonstrates how to use them as the star in her recipe for a pesto paired with broccolini and served with sausage.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Josh Niland, the fish king, surprises all the contestants when he unveils perfectly butchered cuts of beef. He then leads the kitchen in a masterclass on how to butcher a tuna to represent beef cuts.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: MasterChef welcomes esteemed author and Yotam Ottolenghi protégé Ixta Belfrage for a debut visit that packs a punch. The British chef has brought a Mystery Box bursting with her favourite produce.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Today’s pressure test raises the bar, as the contestants are tasked with recreating guest chef Blayne Bertoncello’s highly technical dessert, not just once, but in five consistent dishes.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: It’s the classic MasterChef team-relay challenge, where four teams must compete to create a dish that uses potatoes in at least two ways. The winning team will secure immunity from the next elimination.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Twelve MasterChef contestants are met by a bust of judge Jean-Christophe Novelli, made entirely of butter. Fighting for their place in the competition, they must create a dish celebrating butter.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: After finishing their sauna experience, the Dokbakz arrive at a traditional Lao-style hotpot restaurant, Shin Dat. There they can choose their own ingredients and create their own hotpot.

programme.title: A Lifeguard's Obsession
programme.desc: When a lonely, awkward lifeguard saves a well-known woman from drowning, he believes he's earned a place in her life... and her heart.

programme.title: Look Who's Stalking
programme.desc: After the death of her stalker, a new mother pieces her life back together. But when she realises she's being targeted again she's forced to uncover whether she's being stalked from the grave.

programme.title: My Sister's Serial Killer Boyfriend
programme.desc: When her sister starts to fall for their self-defence instructor, reporter Maddie becomes suspicious and tries to intervene before the relationship turns into a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Killer Fortune Teller
programme.desc: When Michael, an older single man looking for companionship, falls for alluring psychic Janis, she sees him as an easy mark. But will Janis be exposed by Virginia, Michael's concerned relative?

programme.title: Couples Retreat Murder
programme.desc: Trying to save their marriage, Becky and Jim head to a couple's retreat which just so happens to include Becky's ex. Things only get worse when one of the guests goes missing and their host is found dead.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek and Chauncey take on a house that was abandoned by previous flippers! Left with holes in the roof, termite damage and a dilapidated porch this house pushes their skills, and budget, to the limit.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek sees big profit potential when he buys a crumbling old house in a nice neighborhood. Chauncey is skeptical of the half-finished work and the small square footage. Was this all a big mistake?

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek takes Chauncy to see a house in the super desirable North Dallas neighborhood. Even though this smaller home has foundation issues, Derek feels it's too much of a deal to pass on.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael takes us on a Grecian adventure with a recipe for Greek-style lamb meatballs and her very own creation, feta-sghetti, a spaghetti dish served with a decadent white feta sauce.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Walmart has committed to selling AC BBQ rubs and Ced visits Walmart to learn about retail strategies and sidekicks. Mr. Bar-BQ arrives with new prototypes of their ideas and the guys are pleased.

programme.title: What Happened At Hiroshima
programme.desc: On the 80th anniversary of the bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Jordan Dunbar hears from the only people who have ever experienced and survived a nuclear explosion.

programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC.

programme.title: Talking Business (R)
programme.desc: Examining the business stories and economic trends that are re-shaping our world.

programme.desc: Humans can survive catastrophic injuries and deadly scenarios that defy the odds in ways that are inexplicable. Is cheating death when survival is seemingly impossible simply fate or good fortune?

programme.desc: Time Capsule Malaysia explores important points of etiquette, when going to the cinema was the only entertainment we had, and the nine lives of a fellow named Zainal.

programme.desc: Host Razif Hashim finds out the secret behind the success of one of Malaysia's greatest sports champions, looks at a unique set of Malaysian coins, and a weapon that helped preserve Malaysia's sovereignty.

programme.title: FDR (Franklin D. Roosevelt)

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Maging Akin Ka Lamang (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Rosita would do anything to win the love of the man she had become obsessed with. Still, neither her beauty nor all the money in the world gave her what she wanted.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Eseng Ng Tondo
programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Niño Mulach).

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Niño Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 4
programme.desc: Manic Matt laughs hard when the others spend big money on what looks like junk, but when Matt bets his entire wallet on a container he thinks can make him rich, will he wind up the butt of the joke?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 5
programme.desc: Maniac Matt is out to prove a point in the port of Oakland. He gambles early on a container full of liquor, then drives up prices forcing everyone else to pony up.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 6
programme.desc: Always up for an outrageous gamble, Uzi and Schlomi throw down the gauntlet in the biggest auction yet. They win two amazing classic cars, but will a hidden surprise in the back of another container propel one of their rivals to an even bigger payday?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 1
programme.desc: The biggest auction on the planet explodes when a mysterious container from the Far East makes landfall in Los Angeles. Jason thinks he has the inside track, but will someone else unlock its secrets to land the biggest score yet?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 2
programme.desc: Mo and Ty, AKA "Team Muscle," go on the attack, but when the biggest prize goes up for grabs, will their rough tactics come back to bite them?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 3
programme.desc: A mysterious container from Guam has the competition ready for battle. Manic Matt fires a warning shot, but the Israelis aren't backing down. Will this enormous gamble pay off? Or will the container's questionable contents backfire?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 4
programme.desc: The mother lode of all containers makes landfall. Jason and Matt go all in, but will their hunches pay off? Or will beauty queen Deana's fashion sense reel in the ultimate score? A surprise twist could change every rule in the book.

programme.title: Smallville S1 11
programme.desc: Clark is amazed when a pesticide magnate with enhanced powers of persuasion due to the meteor fragments convinces Jonathan to sell the family farm.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 15
programme.desc: The Supreme Court Justice nominee is wrongfully arrested.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 19
programme.desc: When Howard finds a letter from his father, he's forced to confront his past, struggling with whether or not he should open it. And Leonard and Penny throw a grown-up cocktail party at the apartment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 20
programme.desc: Let the battle begin! Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University – and the competition heats up when the girls get involved!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 22
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon hire Professor Proton (guest star BOB NEWHART), the host of their favorite childhood TV show to perform. Raj leaves his dog with Howard and Bernadette.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 2
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q get ballsy while posing as salesmen, and then try to outdo each other as they invade the personal space of confused strangers. And tonight's loser is up against the ropes, playing dress-up for an unruly arena.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 15
programme.desc: The Supreme Court Justice nominee is wrongfully arrested.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: During a scientific expedition to Iceland, scientist Trevor Anderson (Fraser-- Crash, The Mummy), his nephew Sean (Josh Hutcherson) and their local guide, Hannah (Anita Briem), are trapped in a cave -- from which their only escape is to go deeper, into unimagined worlds, where the trio comes face to face with never-before-seen creatures and harrowing dangers as they race an building volcanic eruption to reach the surface!

programme.title: Smallville S1 11
programme.desc: Clark is amazed when a pesticide magnate with enhanced powers of persuasion due to the meteor fragments convinces Jonathan to sell the family farm.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 1
programme.desc: Will Smith plays a young man transplanted from the tough streets of Philadelphia to live with his wealthy Bel-Air relatives, causing everyone to adjust how they live and think.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 2
programme.desc: Ashley's father wants her to continue with her violin lessons, but Will has other ideas.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 3
programme.desc: Will wants to go out with a beautiful girl he meets at the country club, but first he must figure out how to impress her extremely snobbish and very protective father.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 4
programme.desc: When Philip's parents visit from North Carolina, they embarrass him with stories of his poor rural background and his pet pig.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 5
programme.desc: A shady character named "Ice Tray" (guest star Don Cheadle – "Ocean's Thirteen"), one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, comes to Bel-Air for a visit.

programme.title: Friends S5 14
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica's relationship becomes less of a secret. Ross must prove to his boss that he's sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 01
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Michael poses as a hipster at a farmers market and makes an endless supply of juice. Then things become blurry at the eye doctor, and later, shape shifting aliens send Michael's co-worker into a frenzy.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 02
programme.desc: Michael astounds dental patients with molar radio transmissions, and while appraising art, he brings an extinct species back to life. Plus, an unusual brew stirs a ghostly hallucination that will make jaws drop.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 03
programme.desc: Michael stretches headphone cords and reality with a mystical putty, stuns a coworker with new bathroom technology, and in the big finale, a Porta Potty becomes a Portal Potty, leaving a construction worker amazed.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 04
programme.desc: Working at a tattoo parlor, Michael gets some killer ink in a flash. Then it's SNAKES ON A SEDAN when a serpent ambushes a routine car checkup, and down on the docks, one unlucky guy learns a lesson in shrinkage.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 05
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay; a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 2

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr play a game of "Put-Pocket" at a grocery store, then get jumpy at the park after taking over each other's cell phones. And tonight's big loser learns that when you gotta go…you gotta go.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 5
programme.desc: The guys get a little punchy while giving boxing lessons, then head to the mall to share the gift of music with strangers. And when tonight's loser delivers the right speech to the wrong audience, he's the one who gets scared straight.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 6

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: We delve into the experience of growing up on an island when getting from one place to another was an adventure of its own; and learn how Singapore’s maritime industry began in Sembawang, that laid the foundation for our country to become a major port and shipping superpower.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent
programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNA's network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends..

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: A Street Like This
programme.desc: Spancer starts off the show with a bang! Bangkok, to be precise. He visits the country's oldest road - Charoen Krung Road and learns all about its current creative renaissance.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Model Family

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: The First 48 (S22)
programme.desc: In Mobile, when a homeless woman is found executed in an alley and a father of five is shot in a desolate area, detectives rely on clues from one case to help solve the other.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the blood-smeared car of 27-year-old Stefanie Watson is found in a Maryland parking lot, her family holds out hope she's still alive.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man charged with his fourth DUI rages against the machine, and a mom, who's a first-time arrestee, contemplates life as a possible convicted felon. In Modesto, a man is accused of felony arson.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a mother of three is found lying unconscious beneath her open, second-story window, Medical Examiner Dr. Dragovic suspects there is more than meets the eye.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: A fateful choice tragically ends the life of an up-and-coming rapper.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a 13-year-old girl goes missing and is found murdered, virtual evidence she leaves behind leads to two shocking arrests.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy is home alone when a group of robbers breaks into his house. Firefighters plan a dramatic water rescue when a woman's boat gets stuck at the top of a dam.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A first-timer is arrested for reckless driving while on the way to vacation, and a man is brought in on a brandishing a firearm charge while open-carrying in Virginia Beach.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a woman turns shoplifting into a game of chance; a clumsy burglar botches a robbery attempt; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man streaks across a golf course, delaying a tournament. A dead fish is eerily placed on the front porch of a house; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S22)
programme.desc: In Atlanta, a young man is killed in an apartment when a scheme to make easy money goes wrong. A beloved mother is murdered in a drive by shooting leading St. Louis detectives to a neighborhood turf war.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: An argument erupts outside a Florida nightclub. One man is killed, and another is charged with murder. Was it a case of cold-blooded murder, or did he have to shoot to save his own life?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: When a transient man is gunned down, the only eyewitness Mobile detectives have is also a suspect. At trial, reluctant witnesses, defendants pointing fingers at each other.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victim's father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident or murder.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic wants to shine at the science show with his lie detector but she asks Marie a question that's much too personal. Ian discovers that Flavie has opened the door to a stranger.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: July 1942. Vichy France obliges all Jews to wear a yellow star. Ernest and Colette are shocked to see how their friend Rosalie is treated at school, now that she has to wear the star. They are horrified and also want to find a way to resist.

programme.title: Matiere Grise
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'azur.

programme.title: Waouh !
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: After growing up in different countries around the world, Cathal and Karen Quigg chose to settle in La Celle-Dunoise in the Creuse, where the brother and sister opened the restaurant 'L'auberge des pecheurs' and are giving a new lease of life to this small French village.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: He is only 17 years old but already has an impressive track record. French motorcycle rider Matthias Rostagni talks about his early career and his ambitions for the coming years.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir
programme.desc: Feminism is gaining ground in all Quebec's racial groups and in many different ways. Schelby and Keithy discuss the pressures they have already felt within their community. And for men, how should they act in order to be a positive ally?

programme.title: Serge A Paris
programme.desc: Serge meets Gregory Dorcel, the boss of the French adult video empire. He then joins the muse Clara Mia on a photoshoot and has a drink with Anne-Marie Losique. He ends up talking about good manners with Marie de Tilly.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: Surrounded by the towering summits of the Swiss Alps that mark the Via Idra, we look back at some of the finest mountain huts of the Leventina and Verzasca valleys.

programme.title: Les Rencontres Du Papotin
programme.desc: A magazine programme with a difference, along similar lines to the newspaper ''Le Papotin'', with an editorial team of young non-professional journalists on the autism spectrum. For each programme a well-known figure is subjected to a no-holds-barred interview. The rules are simple: anything can be said and anything can happen!

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: Pissarro-Pontoise Art and History Museum displays the impressionist master's works. Mathieu Bassee and the team at Studio MTX are inspired by materials to embroider space. Miu Miu mixes genders and breaks codes. Sculptor and jewellery designer Chloe Valorso creates dreamlike objects inspired by animals, plants and minerals.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: 100 % Logique - La Reponse Est Sous Vos Yeux
programme.desc: The quiz that, rather than testing general knowledge and culture, tests the participants' powers of logic, observation and common sense. One hundred candidates compete for a jackpot that could climb to 100,000 euros. Who will manage to overcome all the obstacles and reach the final question?

programme.title: Signalements
programme.desc: Laurence is fighting to save her niece Karine from her parents' abuse. Despite repeated reports, the courts are keeping the little girl in her home, against all logic. But Laurence does not give up...

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: A fine arts museum located in Pasadena, to the north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum houses a fine collection of European paintings. The post-impressionism movement is notably represented by Bonnard, Vuillard, Gauguin, Cezanne, Van Gogh, Kandinsky, Toulouse-Lautrec, Modigliani, Braque...

programme.title: Affranchies
programme.desc: An ode to girl power, breaking codes through a hybrid of hip hop and contemporary dance. Through raw energy, five dancers express rage, gentleness and frustration. A sensory, vertiginous journey, inspired by the music of Antonio Vivaldi, Steve Reich and Max Richter.

programme.title: Basique, Le Concert
programme.desc: Singer, producer, dancer and actor, M. Pokora is a veritable showman and every year continues to fill France's greatest concert venues. For ''Basique'', he invites us to discover, or rediscover, the very best of his music past and present with a scenography as intense as it is luminous.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Maurice Chevalier, Un Canotier A Hollywood
programme.desc: A legendary French singer and also an actor, dancer and comic, Maurice Chevalier (1888-1972) became a Hollywood star through films of Ernst Lubitsch, Billy Wilder and Vincente Minnelli, his Menilmontant accent and famous straw hat perfectly capturing the spirit of French irreverence. This is his portrait.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Poulets Grilles
programme.desc: Demoted after a professional error, Inspector Anne Capestan is appointed to the mysterious 4th brigade, the police unit that collects the alcoholics, depressed and general misfits cluttering up the force. Yet it's with this unlikely team that she finds herself about to resolve the most important investigation of the moment...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: After growing up in different countries around the world, Cathal and Karen Quigg chose to settle in La Celle-Dunoise in the Creuse, where the brother and sister opened the restaurant 'L'auberge des pecheurs' and are giving a new lease of life to this small French village.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nuï. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: The students criticize the principal and some want the teacher to become the principal. When she meets him in the courtyard, Api tells him about it.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Mika gets a fine lesson on the art of not snitching, but a surprise from Schwoz's Mom might cause her to fail the test.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When a suspicious new student shows up at school, Charlotte and Henry think he may be up to something. Captain Man goes undercover as a substitute teacher to learn more.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph's strength won't save him when he's caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raph's going to have to use his head to get out of this one!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together.

programme.title: Lost in the West Part 3
programme.desc: Chip is stranded in the Wild West and it's up to Dave to rescue his bro. With help from some unlikely allies, can they save the day once and for all and put the future right?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
